sub_title: Strategic Marketing Specialist | Customer Experience "Transforming Businesses through Customer-Centric Marketing Excellence: Elevating Customer Experiences"
summary:
"Embrace the Challenge: Creating Memorable Experiences and Impactful Relationships"

Arriving at university during a time of crisis, my world was turned upside down. Lost and searching for purpose, I realized it was time to take action, connect with new faces, and embark on an extraordinary journey.

From an early age, I've been driven by the desire to bring people together, foster meaningful connections, and create moments of joy. This realization led me to delve into the realms of communication, marketing, and psychology, where I discovered the power to craft unforgettable experiences and forge lasting relationships.

With over five years of experience in Marketing and Communication, I've honed my skills as a Digital Marketing Specialist, strategizing and executing captivating campaigns. I've successfully managed social channels for renowned companies such as Unilife, MARKETERs, and MTP Nuremberg, captivating audiences with engaging advertisements that leave a lasting impact.

My insatiable curiosity about organizational dynamics fuels my drive to think outside the box, push boundaries, and test innovative solutions that positively influence people's lives. This passion led me to undertake the role of Strategic Marketing Consultant, spearheading a transformative Customer Satisfaction project in the B2B market

Throughout my journey, I've collaborated with a diverse array of individuals, both domestically and internationally, to create immersive events that have united over 5000 attendees. By nurturing relationships and generating genuine value, we have left an indelible mark.

Moreover, I've contributed to groundbreaking research projects in Business Organization and Strategic Marketing, tackling vital issues surrounding work and well-being. Additionally, I played a pivotal role in helping a multinational company revamp its customer satisfaction strategy, resolving complex challenges through stakeholder engagement.

I invite you to reach out to me to delve further into these captivating topics. Let's continue the conversation and uncover the transformative possibilities that lie ahead. Together, we can make an impact that resonates far beyond the surface.

education.degree_name: ERASMUS student in Msc Marketing and Management

Linguistic High School St. G. Ricci Curbastro

certifications.name: EELISA (European university) Innovation and Leadership course

projects.title: EELISA Alliance -Innovation and Leadership
projects.description:
During my participation in the Innovation and Leadership Course at FAU University Nuremberg, I had the privilege of being part of an extraordinary international project called EELISA. EELISA is a groundbreaking initiative that unites nine prominent universities from around the world, with a common goal of enhancing the accessibility and exchange of STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) courses.

In this diverse and dynamic team, I assumed the role of Marketing Strategy Manager, where I spearheaded the development and execution of our marketing strategy. Our approach was rooted in agile methodologies such as Scrum and Design Thinking, allowing us to adapt swiftly to evolving challenges and opportunities.

My responsibilities extended to student and professor recruitment, user journey mapping, and the deployment of a comprehensive marketing strategy, leveraging the Flywheel Model for sustained growth. We delivered a compelling mockup of our platform and presented our vision to the commission, resulting in us achieving the highest grade possible.

This transformative experience immersed me in the realms of innovation, marketing, agile methodology, and international management. It provided invaluable insights into collaboration across borders, problem-solving in dynamic environments, and the strategic intricacies of bringing a visionary project to life. EELISA not only deepened my understanding of these key areas but also ignited my passion for driving positive change through innovative solutions in the realm of education.

contributors.headline: Strategic Marketing Specialist | Customer Experience "Transforming Businesses through Customer-Centric Marketing Excellence: Elevating Customer Experiences"

projects.title: Re-imagine your Campus with Creativity, Design Thinking, & User Experience [Organizational Creativity ]
projects.description:
During this university project, we utilized a range of techniques and methodologies, including design thinking, student interviews, augmented reality prototyping, video presentations, project management techniques, and effective communication strategies. Our goal was to generate innovative ideas to enhance the experience of students, faculty, and campus users based on their specific needs.

Through a comprehensive process involving design thinking, we empathetically understood the challenges and aspirations of the stakeholders. We conducted interviews with students to gather insights and perspectives, fostering a user-centered approach. Leveraging augmented reality, we created interactive prototypes to visualize our proposed campus improvements effectively. The video presentations showcased our ideas in a compelling manner, engaging the audience.

Employing project management techniques, we ensured the efficient execution of tasks, meeting project milestones and deliverables. Additionally, our emphasis on clear communication facilitated effective collaboration within the team.

As a result, we developed a unique concept that presented a holistic set of services to the university's board. This concept aimed to transform the campus experience by addressing the specific needs and preferences of students, faculty, and visitors.

Our project exemplified our ability to apply multidisciplinary skills, creativity, and strategic thinking to propose actionable solutions for complex challenges in real-world contexts.

contributors.headline: Strategic Marketing Specialist | Customer Experience "Transforming Businesses through Customer-Centric Marketing Excellence: Elevating Customer Experiences"

projects.title: MARKETERs Generation Swipe Up - Into creator’s life
projects.description:
MARKETERs Generation è il format di eventi del MARKETERs Club Torino che dà voce a brand e personalità che stanno segnando e ispirando un'intera generazione! 

Il 5 dicembre 2020, con MARKETERs Generation: SWIPE UP - Into creators' life ci siamo addentrati nel mondo degli influencer e dei content creators, guidati da ben 12 ospiti d'eccezione. 

L'evento è stato aperto a tutti e si è svolto completamente online, in streaming su doppia piattaforma: Webinarjam e Youtube. 

Gli ospiti erano variegati, ma tutti accomunati dalla passione per i social e per la comunicazione digitale.
Ci hanno raccontato la loro storia, i loro obiettivi per il futuro, e ci hanno spiegato in che cosa consiste realmente il lavoro dietro i contenuti che vediamo.
Ci hanno svelato alcuni retroscena del mestiere, le difficoltà che si sono presentate nel tempo, la pazienza necessaria oltre al tempo e alla dedizione. 

Tra gli argomenti trattati ricordiamo il personal branding, l’organizzazione del piano editoriale, la collaborazione con i brand, l’importanza di un legame sincero con la community. 

I relatori della giornata sono stati: 

*  Filippo Caccamo
* Stefano Tiozzo
* Casa Surace (con Alessio Stranzullo e Luca Persichetti)
* Cucina Botanica (Carlotta Perego)
* Sofia Viscardi (con Helio Di Nardo)
* Cosa Mangiamo oggi? (Giano e Franci)
* Il Milanese Imbruttito (con Tommaso Pozza)
* Slim Dogs
* Fabiana Manager
* Progetto Happiness (Giuseppe Bertuccio D'Angelo)
* Alice Venturi (con Laura Gusmeroli)
* Raissa & Momo 

Io ho partecipato all'organizzazione dell'evento nel ruolo di SEO copywriter

company.name: Spin Lab Academy - University of Turin [Spin off]

profile_positions.company: Spin Lab Academy - University of Turin [Spin off]
profile_positions.description:
As a Strategic Marketing Consultant (Junior), I worked on a strategic consulting project to improve the Customer Satisfaction and Experience of a multinational company operating in the automotive oil and lubricant industry. 

Responsibilities:
- Project Management of tasks and deadline
- Customer journey analysis 
- Leading internal qualitative interviews
- Stakeholder management 
- Business Process Mapping
- Tailored survey design
- Data analysis

Achievements:
- Project Management of tasks and deadlines, + 4 sprints managed
- Lead + 15 internal qualitative analysis about business processes
- 50 + business processes mapped through BPMN, mastered Camunda Tool
- Analysing inefficiencies and devising solutions to tackle bottlenecks
- Designed tailored questionnaires for Customer Satisfaction Analysis
- Stakeholder Management and reports creation
- Promoted from Trainee to Consultant and onboarded new trainee.

Highlights: Business Analysis, Marketing Strategy, Process Mapping, Qualitative Analysis, Customer Satisfaction Programme, Customer Experience, Project Management, Strategic Marketing, Stakeholder Engagement, and Communication.
profile_positions.title: Strategic Marketing Consultant "Customer Success Project"

profile_positions.description:
Master's thesis, an international, multidisciplinary research project in Stakeholder Engagement, Marketing, Digital Communication, and Crisis Management. 
The project was carried out in collaboration with the University of Essex. 

The aim of the project is to understand how organizations can engage their stakeholders through messages based on the principles of Stakeholder Theory. The research analyzed NHS communication and engagement campaigns and developed a theoretical background to support the hypothesis formulated.

In this project, I am involved in:
- Theoretical multidisciplinary research (Stakeholder Theory, Psychology, Crisis Management, Marketing Communication, Health communication)
- More than 150 scientific papers analyzed 
- Spotted the Literature Gap in Stakeholder Theory
- Focus group management
- Presentation of results 
- Analysis of Communication and Marketing Strategies 
- Project management to complete the weekly tasks
- Scientific writing
- Teamwork

The project involves the publication of a scientific article.
profile_positions.title: Student Researcher - Stakeholder Engagement and Marketing Communication

profile_positions.description:
Since October 2020, I have been an active member of MARKETERS CLUB TORINO, where I daily contribute insights and thoughts on various Digital Marketing and Communication topics.

Additionally, I had the opportunity to collaborate with MARKETERS TO for their event, SWIPE UP, where I authored an article focusing on the Instagram algorithm. You can access the article below!

Responsibilities:
- Content Creation
- Engaging with the community
- Providing support to the project manager
- Crafting and executing content strategies
- Organizing online events
- Managing internal communication activities

Achievements:
- Successfully attracted over 300 attendees to SWIPE UP, an online event hosted by MARKETERS CLUB during the quarantine period.
- Educated more than 10 team members on SEO best practices.
- Orchestrated the content strategy for promoting online events and authored articles on various Social Media topics.
- Collaborated effectively with a remote online team spanning across Italy.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Specialist - Member

profile_positions.description:
Collaborated on a Neuromarketing project led by Professor Vito de Feo and Erik Jacobi at the University of Essex, aiming to optimize the user experience and CRO of NEURA e-commerce.
Through this project, I worked with a team of psychologists, marketing experts, and data scientists of different nationalities who enabled me to understand the potential of a Neuromarketing strategy. 


Responsibilities:
- Analyze e-commerce pages
- Analyzing user demographics
- Creating Marketing Personas
- Working symbiotically with the team of data scientists
- Analyzing creative


Achievements:
- 5 user clusters created
- 5 + Marketing Personas created
- 10 + web pages analyzed
- Managed the team of data scientists
- Proposed an optimization strategy for the e-commerce

Highlights: Digital Marketing, Neuromarketing, Data Analysis, Customer Experience, E-commerce, Project Management
profile_positions.title: Neuromarketing Research Student for E-commerce

profile_positions.description:
Bachelor’s research thesis project, study on the Impact of Collaboration Spaces in Emilia-Romagna. 
OPERA Research Unit was managed by Prof. Montanari F. and the project was commissioned by the Emilia-Romagna region. 

Responsibilities:
- Coworking and collaboration spaces research and clustering
- Connecting with coworking managers 
- Leading qualitative interviews with managers and coworkers (user interviews)
- Data analysis of qualitative interviews 
- Literature reviews

Achievements:
- Led 50 qualitative interviews in more than 15 collaboration spaces in seven cities
- 140 Collaboration spaces mapped over Emilia Romagna
- Supported a 6-month group work
- Devised strategic implications
- Elaborated a theory about how municipalities can foster creativity 

Highlights: Field research, Creativity, Data Analysis, User Interviews, Behavioural organization, Social Innovation, Project Management.

Unilife is a student association of the University of Modena and Reggio Emilia, based in Reggio Emilia. 
During my experience, I have held multiple roles that have allowed me to increase my skills, both hard and soft. 

Responsibilities:
- Events organization (Educational, cultural, recreational, and sporting)
- Digital and Offline Communication 
- Digital Marketing campaign management (lead generation and awareness)
- Graphic design for communication material
- PR with Institutions and students
- Project management 
- Members training
- Business development for the organization's activities

Achievements:
- Grew the team from 10 to 35 members
- More than 100 events organized in 36 months
- More than 2,500 people involved in our activities
- More than 20 partnerships established with local businesses
- Made Reggio Emilia lively for university students


Through this experience, I have grown both on a human and professional level. Through the association I was able to expand my network of contacts, getting to collaborate with brands such as RedBull and professionals such as Veronica Civiero, Massimo Tammaro, Marketing Ignorante, and many other people

Highlights: Customer Experience, Event Organization, Social Innovation, PR, Creativity, Marketing, Communication, Advertising, Graphic Design.
